articles.description:
RTâ€‚Austin Cain (ğŸ“œ,ğŸ“œ)
This morning I joined @developer_dao ; if you work for a company building dev tools, you should too.
My rationale:
- Polygon is a developer platform 
- Our partners enable developers
- Our users are developers
How best to understand the pain points of your users? Become one.
